gunslinger.name: Gunslinger
gunslinger.description: Former lawman, outlaw, or duelist with a reputation for quick draws and deadly aim.
gunslinger.backstory: Whether you wore a badge or ran from the law, your skill with a six-shooter has defined your life. Now you're looking for something more than just the next gunfight.

scout.name: Scout
scout.description: Army scout, frontier guide, or experienced trapper who knows the wilderness like the back of their hand.
scout.backstory: You've spent years reading trails, tracking game, and guiding others through dangerous territory. The frontier is your home.

prospector.name: Prospector
prospector.description: Gold rush veteran and treasure hunter with an eye for valuables and a nose for opportunity.
prospector.backstory: You've chased strikes from California to Colorado, always believing the next big find is just around the corner. Maybe this time you're right.

outlaw.name: Outlaw
outlaw.description: Bandit, rustler, or robber living outside the law with a price on their head.
outlaw.backstory: The law says you're a criminal, but you know it's more complicated than that. Or maybe it isn't. Either way, there's no going back now.
outlaw.playstyle: Criminal activities, stealth, morally gray choices

preacher.name: Preacher
preacher.description: Circuit preacher, missionary, or reformed sinner spreading the word across the frontier.
preacher.backstory: You carry a Bible and a message of hope to the lost souls of the frontier. But out here, sometimes faith alone isn't enough.
preacher.playstyle: Social interactions, healing, moral choices, social combat

drifter.name: Drifter
drifter.description: Wanderer with no ties, a mysterious past, and a knack for picking things up quickly.
drifter.backstory: You've been moving from place to place for as long as you can remember. No roots, no attachments, just the open road ahead.

native_scout.name: Native Scout
native_scout.description: Tribal warrior and guide caught between two worlds, with deep knowledge of the land and its spirits.
native_scout.backstory: Your people have lived on this land since time immemorial. Now strangers flood across it, and you must find your place in a changing world.
native_scout.playstyle: Wilderness expert, cultural mediator, supernatural connection

occultist.name: Occultist
occultist.description: Hedge witch, fortune teller, or someone touched by forces beyond normal understanding.
occultist.backstory: You've always seen things others couldn't. Whether it's a gift or a curse, the veil between worlds is thin for you.
occultist.playstyle: Supernatural specialist, information gathering, unique solutions

difficulty_descriptions.easy: More resources and money to start. Good for learning the game.
difficulty_descriptions.normal: Balanced starting position. The intended experience.
difficulty_descriptions.hard: Fewer resources or special challenges. For experienced players.

tag_descriptions.combat: Strong in direct confrontations and gunfights.
tag_descriptions.survival: Excels at wilderness survival and self-sufficiency.
tag_descriptions.social: Skilled at dealing with people and resolving conflicts peacefully.
tag_descriptions.exploration: Good at finding resources, secrets, and navigating the frontier.
tag_descriptions.stealth: Capable of avoiding detection and striking from the shadows.
tag_descriptions.supernatural: Has connection to forces beyond normal understanding.
tag_descriptions.support: Helps allies and provides healing or buffs.
